trans-unit.source: A text entry box that provides suggestions as the user types.
trans-unit.target: A text entry box that provides suggestions as the user types.

trans-unit.source: Guidelines for auto-suggest boxes
trans-unit.target: Guidelines for auto-suggest boxes

trans-unit.source: Auto-suggest box
trans-unit.target: Auto-suggest box

trans-unit.source: Use an AutoSuggestBox to provide a list of suggestions for a user to select from as they type.
trans-unit.target: Use an AutoSuggestBox to provide a list of suggestions for a user to select from as they type.

trans-unit.source: An auto suggest box
trans-unit.target: An auto suggest box

trans-unit.source: Is this the right control?
trans-unit.target: Is this the right control?

trans-unit.source: If you'd like a simple, customizable control that allows text search with a list of suggestions, then choose an auto-suggest box.
trans-unit.target: If you'd like a simple, customizable control that allows text search with a list of suggestions, then choose an auto-suggest box.

trans-unit.source: For more info about choosing the right text control, see the [Text controls](text-controls.md) article.
trans-unit.target: For more info about choosing the right text control, see the [Text controls](text-controls.md) article.

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: Examples

trans-unit.source: An auto suggest box in the Groove Music app.
trans-unit.target: An auto suggest box in the Groove Music app.

trans-unit.target: An auto suggest box in the Groove Music app

trans-unit.source: Anatomy
trans-unit.target: Anatomy

trans-unit.source: The entry point for the auto-suggest box consists of an optional header and a text box with optional hint text:
trans-unit.target: The entry point for the auto-suggest box consists of an optional header and a text box with optional hint text:

trans-unit.source: Example of the entry point for auto-suggest control
trans-unit.target: Example of the entry point for auto-suggest control

trans-unit.source: The auto-suggest results list populates automatically once the user starts to enter text.
trans-unit.target: The auto-suggest results list populates automatically once the user starts to enter text.

trans-unit.source: The results list can appear above or below the text entry box.
trans-unit.target: The results list can appear above or below the text entry box.

trans-unit.source: A "clear all" button appears:
trans-unit.target: A "clear all" button appears:

trans-unit.source: Example of the expanded auto-suggest control
trans-unit.target: Example of the expanded auto-suggest control

trans-unit.source: Create an auto-suggest box
trans-unit.target: Create an auto-suggest box

trans-unit.source: To use an AutoSuggestBox, you need to respond to 3 user actions.
trans-unit.target: To use an AutoSuggestBox, you need to respond to 3 user actions.

trans-unit.source: Text changed - When the user enters text, update the suggestion list.
trans-unit.target: Text changed - When the user enters text, update the suggestion list.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion chosen - When the user chooses a suggestion in the suggestion list, update the text box.
trans-unit.target: Suggestion chosen - When the user chooses a suggestion in the suggestion list, update the text box.

trans-unit.source: Query submitted - When the user submits a query, show the query results.
trans-unit.target: Query submitted - When the user submits a query, show the query results.

trans-unit.source: Text changed
trans-unit.target: Text changed

trans-unit.source: The [**TextChanged**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.textchanged.aspx) event occurs whenever the content of the text box is updated.
trans-unit.target: The [**TextChanged**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.textchanged.aspx) event occurs whenever the content of the text box is updated.

trans-unit.source: Use the event args [Reason](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestboxtextchangedeventargs.reason.aspx) property to determine whether the change was due to user input.
trans-unit.target: Use the event args [Reason](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestboxtextchangedeventargs.reason.aspx) property to determine whether the change was due to user input.

trans-unit.source: If the change reason is **UserInput**, filter your data based on the input.
trans-unit.target: If the change reason is **UserInput**, filter your data based on the input.

trans-unit.source: Then, set the filtered data as the [ItemsSource](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.itemscontrol.itemssource.aspx) of the AutoSuggestBox to update the suggestion list.
trans-unit.target: Then, set the filtered data as the [ItemsSource](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.itemscontrol.itemssource.aspx) of the AutoSuggestBox to update the suggestion list.

trans-unit.source: To control how items are displayed in the suggestion list, you can use [DisplayMemberPath](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.itemscontrol.displaymemberpath.aspx) or [ItemTemplate](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.itemscontrol.itemtemplate.aspx).
trans-unit.target: To control how items are displayed in the suggestion list, you can use [DisplayMemberPath](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.itemscontrol.displaymemberpath.aspx) or [ItemTemplate](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.itemscontrol.itemtemplate.aspx).

trans-unit.source: To display the text of a single property of your data item, set the DisplayMemberPath property to choose which property from your object to display in the suggestion list.
trans-unit.target: To display the text of a single property of your data item, set the DisplayMemberPath property to choose which property from your object to display in the suggestion list.

trans-unit.source: To define a custom look for each item in the list, use the ItemTemplate property.
trans-unit.target: To define a custom look for each item in the list, use the ItemTemplate property.

trans-unit.source: Suggestion chosen
trans-unit.target: Suggestion chosen

trans-unit.source: When a user navigates through the suggestion list using the keyboard, you need to update the text in the text box to match.
trans-unit.target: When a user navigates through the suggestion list using the keyboard, you need to update the text in the text box to match.

trans-unit.source: You can set the [TextMemberPath](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.textmemberpath.aspx) property to choose which property from your data object to display in the text box.
trans-unit.target: You can set the [TextMemberPath](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.textmemberpath.aspx) property to choose which property from your data object to display in the text box.

trans-unit.source: If you specify a TextMemberPath, the text box is updated automatically.
trans-unit.target: If you specify a TextMemberPath, the text box is updated automatically.

trans-unit.source: You should typically specify the same value for DisplayMemberPath and TextMemberPath so the text is the same in the suggestion list and the text box.
trans-unit.target: You should typically specify the same value for DisplayMemberPath and TextMemberPath so the text is the same in the suggestion list and the text box.

trans-unit.source: If you need to show more than a simple property, handle the [SuggestionChosen](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.suggestionchosen.aspx) event to populate the text box with custom text based on the selected item.
trans-unit.target: If you need to show more than a simple property, handle the [SuggestionChosen](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.suggestionchosen.aspx) event to populate the text box with custom text based on the selected item.

trans-unit.source: Query submitted
trans-unit.target: Query submitted

trans-unit.source: Handle the [QuerySubmitted](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.querysubmitted.aspx) event to perform a query action appropriate to your app and show the result to the user.
trans-unit.target: Handle the [QuerySubmitted](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.querysubmitted.aspx) event to perform a query action appropriate to your app and show the result to the user.

trans-unit.source: The QuerySubmitted event occurs when a user commits a query string.
trans-unit.target: The QuerySubmitted event occurs when a user commits a query string.

trans-unit.source: The user can commit a query in one of these ways:
trans-unit.target: The user can commit a query in one of these ways:

trans-unit.source: While the focus is in the text box, press Enter or click the query icon.
trans-unit.target: While the focus is in the text box, press Enter or click the query icon.

trans-unit.source: The event args [ChosenSuggestion](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestboxquerysubmittedeventargs.chosensuggestion.aspx) property is **null**.
trans-unit.target: The event args [ChosenSuggestion](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestboxquerysubmittedeventargs.chosensuggestion.aspx) property is **null**.

trans-unit.source: While the focus is in the suggestion list, press Enter, click, or tap an item.
trans-unit.target: While the focus is in the suggestion list, press Enter, click, or tap an item.

trans-unit.source: The event args ChosenSuggestion property contains the item that was selected from the list.
trans-unit.target: The event args ChosenSuggestion property contains the item that was selected from the list.

trans-unit.source: In all cases, the event args [QueryText](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestboxquerysubmittedeventargs.querytext.aspx) property contains the text from the text box.
trans-unit.target: In all cases, the event args [QueryText](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestboxquerysubmittedeventargs.querytext.aspx) property contains the text from the text box.

trans-unit.source: Use AutoSuggestBox for search
trans-unit.target: Use AutoSuggestBox for search

trans-unit.source: Use an AutoSuggestBox to provide a list of suggestions for a user to select from as they type.
trans-unit.target: Use an AutoSuggestBox to provide a list of suggestions for a user to select from as they type.

trans-unit.source: By default, the text entry box doesn’t have a query button shown.
trans-unit.target: By default, the text entry box doesn’t have a query button shown.

trans-unit.source: You can set the [QueryIcon](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.queryicon.aspx) property to add a button with the specified icon on the right side of the text box.
trans-unit.target: You can set the [QueryIcon](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/windows.ui.xaml.controls.autosuggestbox.queryicon.aspx) property to add a button with the specified icon on the right side of the text box.

trans-unit.source: For example, to make the AutoSuggestBox look like a typical search box, add a ‘find’ icon, like this.
trans-unit.target: For example, to make the AutoSuggestBox look like a typical search box, add a ‘find’ icon, like this.

trans-unit.source: Here's an AutoSuggestBox with a 'find' icon.
trans-unit.target: Here's an AutoSuggestBox with a 'find' icon.

trans-unit.target: To see a complete working examples of AutoSuggestBox, see the [AutoSuggestBox migration sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619996) and [XAML UI Basics sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=619992).

trans-unit.source: Recommendations
trans-unit.target: Recommendations

trans-unit.source: When using the auto-suggest box to perform searches and no search results exist for the entered text, display a single-line "No results" message as the result so that users know their search request executed:
trans-unit.target: When using the auto-suggest box to perform searches and no search results exist for the entered text, display a single-line "No results" message as the result so that users know their search request executed:

trans-unit.source: Example of an auto suggest box with no search results
trans-unit.target: Example of an auto suggest box with no search results
